evidence.claim: Bolder Healthcare is HIPAA compliant, ensuring secure handling of patient data.
The company facilitates X12 EDI transactions, which are standard for electronic health care transactions.
Bolder utilizes FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare data exchange.
HL7 is implemented within systems for effective health information sharing.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on HIPAA compliance and EDI transactions aligns with X12 use cases.
